episodes.synopsis: Salty gets ready for a big lunch by splashing on some special aftershave, but Lily tells him that it smells bad.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Lily and her friends get together to surprise Salty by fixing up his boat, Bertha.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: When Nonna is stuck in bed resting after taking a big fall, Salty cooks pudding but gets the recipe all wrong.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Lily finds a whisk on the beach, then joins Nonna's baking class. But Nonna isn't open to any new ideas, which makes her class tough to take.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Lily pretends that a pipe she found on the beach is a telescope but realizes she'll need something better if she wants to see the stars up close.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Lily and Salty set sail for a carnival, but the wind dies down and they're left drifting. Lily is sad, but Salty shows her it can be fun to be at sea.
episodes.title: Episode 6

video.title: Lily's Driftwood Bay
video.synopsis: Imaginative Lily lives virtually alone on a deserted beach but spends her days dreaming up new adventures on a secret island of her own invention.
